content: Daivamaaya kartthaave! Thaalkkaalikamaaya jeevithatthil ninnu ippoll verpettu ee vyarththhalokatthil ninnu yaathrayaayirikkunna ee aathmaavu punaruththhaana divasamvare aashvaasavum santoshavum aanandavum niranya sthhalangallilekku ninte vishuddhamaalaakhamaaraal nayikkappeduvaanum avidevachu mukhaprasannathayodu koode ninne ethirelkkuvaanum samgathiyaakkaname. Aabovabro…

Mrthaneppol nyaan vismrthanaay-haale....
Paazhpaathram po-laayen nyaan.

Chonnen nee thaanen Daivam-haale....
Nin kaiyil thaan-kaalangall.

Satthamane! Karunaapoornnaa!
Vidhiyelkkaruthe ninnadiyaar
Thirumumpil jayamaarnnonaar?
Vidhi cheyyalle neeyavare
/tkartthaave!-avare anpaal
/tjeevippikkenam; ninne
Nyangallithaa vaazhttheedunnu.

items.content: Aathmaakkallude srashdaavum shareerangallude nirmmithaavum, nirmmithamaayavayude sharanavum, srshdikallude prathyaashayum kabaradakkappettavarude punaruththhaanavum, marichupoyavarude uyirppum duഃkhichirikkunnavarude aashvaasavum, vishaadichirikkunnavarude aahlaadavum vilaapatthilirikkunnavarude santoshavum manovedanayil irikkunnavarude dhairyavumaaya kartthaavinu sthuthi. Thante daasante shavasamskkaara shushroosha nirvahikkappedunna ee samayatthum..........Bkulhun..

Aadyantamillaattha thejassum, mahaakaarunyavaanum sathyavaanum, maranamillaaymayude prabhayum jeevanum uravayum, sakalatthinteyum srashdaavum lokattheyum athile avasthhaantarangalleyum krameekarikkunnavanumaaya kartthaave! Nee bhayangkaranum ninte kalpanayil mahaneeyanum deerghakshamayullllavanum kaarunyavaanum aakunnu. Yaathoru rahasyavum ninte divyadrshdikku agocharamalla. Aalochanakallude aazhavum hrdayachintakallum thirusannidhiyil parasyamaayi vellippettirikkunnu. Ninte theerumaanangall aparimithangallum ninte maargangall durgrahangallumaakunnu. Maranatthe maayichukallayuvaanum manushyasamhaarakanaaya mahaasarppatthe kolluvaanumaayittu yeshumishihaayenna ninte vathsalaputhrane lokatthilekku nee ayaykkukayum thaalparyamulllla sakala aathmaakkallkkum rakshayum maranamillaaymayum avan prasamgikkukayum cheythu. Ninte kalpanaprakaaram kleshapoornnamaaya ee lokatthilninnu shreshdhavum anashvaravumaaya lokatthilekku nyangall ayaykkappedunnu. Kartthaadhikartthaavum irulokangallkkum adhikaariyumaayullllove! Ee thaalkkaalika jeevithamaakunna paradeshavaasatthilninnu verpettu yaathrayaayirikkunna ee ninte daasante shavasamskkaara shushrooshayude ee samayatthu thirusannidhiyil nyangall apekshayum praarththhanayum samarppikkunnu. Ivideninnu yaathrayaakki svargeeya bhavanangallil vasippikkunnavaraaya samaadhaana maalaakhamaarmoolam ivante aathmaavine nee kaikkollllaname. Kartthaave! Dushdaathmaakkallude pidiyilninnum ivante aathmaavine rakshichukollllaname. Aa ethiraalliyude bandhanatthil ninnu athine vidurtthaname. Thirunaamabhaktharum thiruvishdam aacharikkunnavarumaayavare chutti nilkkunnathupolulllla senakall ivanum labhikkumaaraakaname. Ninte manushyapreethiyaal ivante paapangall poornnamaayi pariharikkaname. Ivante thettukalle ninte dayayaal poornnamaayi kshamikkukayum cheyyaname.  Ivante yaathraykku ninte sahaayam parasyamaayi ayachukodukkaname. Krpaapoornnamaaya valamkai ivanu neettikkodutthu randaam maranamaakunna chuzhiyilninnu ivane uddharichukollllaname. Adrshyamaaya ninte shakthiyaal ivane sahaayikkaname. Pishaachukkallude bhayangkaramaaya ollividangallilninnu ivane rakshichukollllaname. Ivante pramaanalamghanangallkku thakkapole ivane nee vidhikkaruthe; thirusannidhiyil sarvvarum kuttakkaar thanneyaanallo. Kartthaave! Nyangallude svaabhaavikamaaya durbalathayil kanivuthonnaname. Nyangallil villikkappettirikkunnathaaya thirunaamattheyum ninte mahaakarunayeyum nyangallilum ivanilum orkkaname. Nyangallude vargatthinte rakshaykkuvendiyundaaya ninte ekaputhrante kashdaanubhavangall ninnodapekshikkumaaraakaname. Ninte krpayum karunayum ivantemel udikkumaaraakaname. Ivan vishvasichathaaya jayamulllla sleebaa+ ivan, vishuddhanmaarude samoohatthil vasippikkunna prakaasha sthambhamaayi bhavikkumaaraakaname. Nyangallude vamshashathruvaaya saatthaan thante dushdamaaya aagraham niraveraathe lajichu pokatthakkavannam ninte karuna ivanil undaakumaaraakaname. Kartthaave! Thirunaamabhakthanmaarkkulllla anugraheetha bhavanangallil etthunnathuvare ee ninte daasanu kottayum anuyaayiyum kaavalkkaaranum sahaayiyum aayirikkaname. Avide aadyantamillaatthathaaya ninte mahimayil ivan aanandikkumaaraakaname. Abrahaaminte madiyil vishramichukondu ellaa duഃkhangallum kleshangallum kashdathakallum vismarikkuvaan ivanu samgathiyaakkaname. Kartthaave! Ninte aaraadhakaraaya nyangalleyellaavareyum ivaykkellaam yogyaraakkittheerkkaname. Vedippullllathum aanandakaravum paaparahithavumaaya jeevithatthaal andhakaaratthinte dushdasenakallkku vidheyamaakaattha samaadhaanaparamaaya niryaanam nyangallum anubhavikkaan idayaakaname. Kartthaave! Karunaadrshdiyaal nyangalle kadaakshichu vilapichirikkunnavare aashvasippikkukayum duഃkhichirikkunnavare dhairyappedutthukayum mlaanavadanaraayirikkunnavarkku mukhaprasannatha nalkukayum cheyyaname. Ninne sthuthikkunna evarkkum ethusthhaanatthum avanavante aavashyaanusaranam nee sharanavum prathyaashayum aayirunnukondu avarude mukhatthuninnu kannuneerum duഃkhavum neekkikkallayaname daivame! Ninte mashihaayilulllla prathyaashayil munkootti ninte adukkalekku yaathrapurappettavarum shreshdhavum mahaneeyavumaaya avidutthe prathyakshathaye pratheekshichukondirikkunnavarumaaya nyangallude ellaa maathaapithaakkallkkum sahodareesahodaranmaarkkum gurukkanmaarkkum nyangallellaavareyum vahichirikkunna ninte krpayaal bhaagyakaramaaya bhavanangallil vishuddha nmaarodukoodiyulllla aashvaasam nalkaname. Aa prathyakshathaye lajaarahithamaaya prasannamukhangallodu koode ethirelkkuvaan nyangallum kaatthirikkunnu. Kartthaave! Munkootti nidrapraapichavarum ivide avasheshikkunnavarumaayi rakshitharum avidutthe kartthrthvatthinte daasarumaaya nyangallellaavarum aadyantamillaattha ninte raajyatthil vandyavum grahanaatheethavumaaya ninte naamattheyum ninte ekaputhraneyum ninte parishuddharoohaayeyum sthuthichu pukazhtthuvaan yogyaraayittheeraname. Hosho.....

content:
Maranam praapichazhukippo-yonaam
Laasarine kabaree-nnaahvaanam cheytha
Srashdaavinnaajnyaa-dhvani uththhaana mahaadivase
Mrthare-etticherkkum
Yoshaaphaatthenna-saanusthhaanatthil.
Arachanirikkum thronosil.
Sathyavidhikkaayu thalamurakall vannettheedum.
Naathhaa! Sarvveshaa! Enmelannaallil
Kaarunyam cheyyenam nee-praanapradanallo.

items.content: Kaarunyavaanaaya daivame! Ninnil abhayam praapichukondu ee sugandhadhoopam nyangall anaykkukayum ninte kalpanaprakaaram ivideyulllla jeevithatthilninnu vittumaariyirikkunna ee aathmaavinuvendi ninnodapekshikkukayum cheyyunnu. Pishaachukkallude kadhinabandhanatthilninnum antareekshavaasikallum adyashyarumaaya shathrukkallude adyashyaganatthilninnum ee aathmaavu rakshikkappedumaaraakaname. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithyadaivavume! Ee aathmaavu yaathracheythu ninte vishuddhanmaarude aalayangallilum jeevanullllavarude pattanatthilum chennucheruvaan, nyangallilulllla ninte mahaakarunayaal samgathiyaakkukayum cheyyaname. Moraan vaalohaan….

content:
Dhanyan mashihaa vaakkaal mrthare uyarppippon
Thankalppana paa-lichorkkaayu
Thejo-vasthram nalkeedum
/tavane raajyatthethirelpaan
/tavar meghangallileri varum.
Avanaanandattho-daarkkum:
“vanne-ri kaikkondiduvin,
Kalppana kaattho-rkkaayu mumpe-
Thaathan karutheedumaa-raajyam.'’

Maammodeesaa-neeril ninnum mshee-haa than
Rooshmaa ettore mrthare!
Vazhi ni-ngallkkundaashippaan
/tmrthilokatthil dheerathayum
/tprathyaashayathum praapippin
Uyirodezhunnelkkum ningall
Kede-thum theendeedaathe
Kallarayinnum parudeesaa
Pookaan vaasaramaa-sannam.

Dhanyan paulo-shleehaa chonnevam-ketten:
Mrthare ortthi-ttazhal ningall-
Kkaruthennaashicheedunnen.
/tvaanin kaahallanaadatthaal
/tmrtharellaarumezhunnelkkum
Thaalkkaalikamaamee-gaathram
Nithya-thaye praapicheedum
Thanuvezhunnelkkum kedillaa-
Thuththhaa-natthin vannaallil.

Varshikkatte thaatha-nayichittaa baabel
Theechoollayil baa-lanmaaril
Veezhtthiya jeevappanineeraa
/tmrthilokatthaakulamerum-
/tbhavanangallil maruvunnoril.
Ninnabhayatthil nidritharaam
Daasa-nmaar than pizha pokkee-
Ttavakaasham nal-keedenam
Shaashvatha susthhira raajyatthil.

Ithu mrthiyin divasam-vedanayin divasam
Paridevana divasam-kadudivasam naathhaa!
/tnalkanamaa-shvaa-sam.

Sahajan rakshikkaa-snehithanuthakeedaa
Evam nibivachanam-kriyayaal niraveri
/tthuna naathhaa-che-yka.

Naavukalleennellaam-sthothram kartthaave!
Ninnaal mrtharuyarum-svargam nedeedum
/tsthothram paa-dee-dum.

Ee daasan naathhaa! Thirusannidhiyil
Cheytha pizha-ykkellaam-kshama nal-kenam.

Ninne e-ttonaam-ee daa-sane nee
Ettu para-nyidanam-vaagdaa-nam pol.

Aadaam nijamakkallkkekiya kaasaa
Aa mrthipaaneeyatthinu kayperum.
Paanam chey/u200bvaan aadaami
Nnaathmaja-rathu murayaayu kaimaari.

Haale...U haale... Preethippetteedaname adiyaanil
Erum krpayaalivane rakshikka. Haale…

items.content: Yeshu avarodu iprakaaram paranyu:-

“nyaan sathyamaayum sathyamaayum ningallodu parayunnu; pithaavu cheyyunnathaayi kaanunnathallaathe puthranu svantamaayi onnum cheyyuvaan kazhiyukayilla. Entennaal pithaavu cheyyunnavaye aprakaaram thanne-puthranum cheyyunnu. Pithaavu thante puthrane snehikkukayum thaan cheyyunnathellaam avanu kaanichukodukkukayum cheyyunnu. Ningall athbhuthappeduvaanaayittu avayilupariyaayittulllla pravrtthikalleyum avanu kaanichukodukkunnu. Pithaavu marichavare uddharichu jeevippikkunnathupole thanne puthranum thanikkishdappedunnavare jeevippikkunnu. Pithaavine bahumaanikkunnathupole ellaavarum puthraneyum bahumaanippaanaayittu pithaavu oruvanum vidhi nalkaathe nyaayavidhiyellaam puthrane elppichirikku nnu. Puthrane bahumaanikkaatthavar avane ayacha pithaavineyum bahumaanikkunnilla. Nyaan sathyamaayum sathyamaayum ningallodu parayunnu, ente vachanamkettu enne ayachavane vishvasikkunnavanu nithyajeevan und. Avan nyaayavisthaaratthilullppedaathe maranam vittu jeevanilekku kadannirikkunnu. Nyaan sathyamaayum sathyamaayum ningallodu parayunnu. Marichavar daivaputhrante shabdam kellkkukayum kellkkunnavar jeevikkukayum cheyyunna samayam varunnu, athu ippoll thanneyumaakunnu. Entennaal pithaavinu thannilthanne jeevanullllaprakaaram puthranum thannilthanne jeevanundaayirippaan thakkavannam varam kodutthittund. Nyaayavidhikoodiyum nadatthuvaan avane adhikaarappedutthiyirikkunnu. Entennaal avan manushyaputhranaakunnu. Shavakkallarayil sthhithicheyyunnavarellaam avante shabdam kettu nanma cheythavar jeevanuvendiyum thinmacheythavar danda vidhikkuvendiyum punaruththhaanam cheyyunna samayam varunnu. Ithil ningall athbhuthappett.
Naamellaavarum duഃkhatthodum sangkadatthodumkoode yogyamaayi ninnukondu daivatthinu preethikaramaaya shabdatthil kuriyelaayisson ennu ettu chollanam.
Kuriyelaayisson.

Jeevanteyum maranatthinteyum mel adhikaaramullllavanum, maranatthinteyum viyogatthinteyum udayavanum, aathmaakkalludeyum sarvva jadangalludeyum daivavumaaya mishihaathampuraane! Ninnodu nyangall apekshikkunnu.
Kuriyelaayisson.

“nyaan punaruththhaanavum jeevanumaakunnu, ennil vishvasikkunna evanum nithyajeevanund. Avan nyaayavidhiyil ullppedaathe maranatthil ninnu jeevanilekku maarikkazhinyirikkunnu” ennu arullicheythavanaaya mashihaathampuraane! Ninnodu nyangall apekshikkunnu.
Kuriyelaayistton.

Marikkunna evanteyum maranagathi kaalil thudangi thalavare etthunnathinidaykku avante manassu anuthaapatthilekku dhrthippettukondirikkanam ennu jnyaanasampoornnamaaya thante manushyaavathaaratthil kalppichu krameekarichavanaaya mashihaa thampuraane! Ninnodu nyangall apekshikkunnu.
Kuriyelaayisson.

Nyangallellaavarudeyum aathmaakkalle aakelkkarusaayudeyum sainyangalludeyum aadhipathyatthil ninnu svathantramaakki rakshichavanaaya kartthaave! Dushdanmaarude aathmaakkalle pidikooduvaanaayi antareekshatthil pathiyirikkunnavaril ninnu ee nyangallude sahodarante aathmaavine nee rakshichu svargeeya oorshlemil etthikkumaaraakaname. Ennu ninnodu nyangall apekshikkunnu.
Kuriyelaayisson.

Kartthaave! Nyangall ninte randaamatthe varavil ninte ethirelppinaayi purappedukayum sakala parishuddhanmaarumorumichu ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum parishuddha roohaayeyum sthuthikkukayum cheyyatthakkavannam santoshapradamaaya ninte punaruththhaanatthinte prakaasharashmikallaal nyangallellaavarudeyum aathmaakkalle prashobhippikkaname. Naam moonnu praavashyam kuriyelaayisson ennu ettuchollanam.
Kuriye...... Kuriye...... Kuriye….

content:
Vathsalare doora-tthentinu nilkkunnen
Arikil varin, shlomo tharuvin, praarththhichiduvin.
Sangkada keertthanamen-perkkaayu paadiduvin
Mrthi paathaallakavaadatthil bandhichenne.

Maranatthin doothan-pirake vannappoll
Chuttum paartthen thuna chey/u200bvaan vannillaarum
Villi koottunnorkkaay-vellivaakum naathhaa!
Nin daivikamaam valabhaage nirtthanamenne.

Vathsalare sathyam bhayamaarnneedunnen
Kadhinabhayatthaalennakathaarillakeedunnu.
Jagatheerakshakanaam-mashihaa nrpanen per-
Kkaall vittathinaal pokunnen sangkadapoorvvam.

Bhuvananivaasikalle! Shubhamodu vaaneeduvin
Lokamayanmaarkkilla gunam kaalam moolam.
Pokunnen nalkaan-ente kanakkellaam
Sarvvarahasyavidheeshan than thirusannidhiyil

Vairoopyam sumukhar-kkekum mrthiye nee
Snehithanodu modippone khedippikkum.
Vannini nin bharanam-neekki duഃkhithare
Svaprabhayaal modippikkum naathhan dhanyan.

Paazhoozhiyiluyarum-shooshaanappookkall
Vasthram kaippaniyallaatthathu chaarttheedum pol
Aadaam makkallkkaay-roohkkudishaa neythu
Vasthramuyirppil chaarttheedum punyaathmaakkall.

items.content: Thante daivika kalpanayaalum karthrhithaprakaaravum ee sahodarane ee thaalkkaalika jeevithatthilninnu yaathrayaakkiya daivamaaya kartthaave! Thirusannidhiyil ninnu svargeeyasenakallude sahaayam ivanu ayachu kodukkaname. Ivante mrthashareeratthil veezhtthappedunna ee thailam mukhaantiram aayaaril pathiyirunnu manushyaathmaakkallumaayi poraattam nadatthunna prathikoola sainyangallilninnum shathruvinte paallayangallilninnum ivan rakshapedumaaraakaname. Prakaashabhavanangallil vishuddhanmaarodukoodiyulllla aanandatthilekku ivane aanayikkukayum cheyyaname. Ivan santoshatthodum aanandatthodum koodi ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddha roohaaykkum sthuthi paadukayum cheyyumaaraakaname.
(mukhatthum nenchatthum kaalmuttukallilum kurishaakrthiyil thailam veezhtthikkond)

Prayathnangallil ninnulllla vishramatthinum yuddhangallil ninnulllla samrakshanatthinum vishuddhanmaarodukoodiyulllla aanandatthinumaayi pithaavinteyum + puthranteyum + parishuddha roohaayudeyum + naamatthil nithyajeevanuvendi ee thailam ozhikkappedunnu.

content: Nee mannaakunnu, mannilekku thanne thirike cherum, veendum naveekarikkappedukayum cheyyum ennarullicheytha prakaaram kartthaave! Ithaa thiruvishdam ee daasanil niraveriyirikkunnu.

Sthuthyan-maartthaa mariyaam than-sodaranaa-kum
Lovo-sar cheenyennaalum-jeevan-kalpichon,
Nee chennappoll yaayeero-sthutha jeevi-chaall
Mrtharantyatthil jeevikkum-ninnaa-hvaanatthaal.

Mrthasa-ngkethe manmayanaa-maadaamo-daay
niyamam-thalllliya-manmayane-khedi-kkendaa nee;
Mrthiyum-jeevanumekeedum-daivasuthan-nyaa-
Nenno-thiya bahubalavaanaam-svargeeyan sthuthyan.

Chaathuryatthodu bhuvanatthe marananuka-tthil
Bandhi-choru vijnyan srashdaa-vunna-tharaaymevum
Nrpare-padavikallil ninnum bheekararaa-kum
Vidhika-rtthaakkalle bharanatthil-ninnum-neekkunnu.

Thrppaa-vana thanuvoduyirin-rudhiravume-ttoru
vishvaasikall mrtharettidumee dhoopa-tthaal punyam.
Jeeva-pradanaam mashihaa nin-daivikamaam vala-
Bhaaga-tthavar nilakondange-sthuthi-paa-deedatte.
Pethgomo:- avan ennodu paranyappoll nyaan santoshichu.

Kartthaavu varum-mrthare uyirppikkum
Sharanam nalkum-sakala paretharkkum.

Kozhayathena-dushdane shishdaneyum
Kondiha pokum-mrthi vachon dhanyan

Oru nimisham ko-ndudayone! Mrthare
Jeevippikkum-nin varavathigoodham.

Ennenneykkum-shlomo nalkiduvin
Orkkin priyare! Enne praarththhanayil

Mrthiye! Kashdam-saatthaane! Kashdam
Ningade bharanam-mishihaa maayikkum.

Nammude raksha-ykkezhunnalllliya naathhan
Nammude jeeva-nnezhunnallllum noonam.

Nin sleebaaye-nampiyathaamaathmam
Nin varavingkal nin krpa kaanenam.

Naathhaa! Vidhiyil-nee krpa cheythiduvaan
ninne namikku-nnaathma shareerangall.

Krpa cheyyaname-nin krpayaalennil
Nyaan kaananame-nin krpa nin varavil.

Nyangallude rakshaykkuvendi vannavanum nyangallude punaruththhaanatthinaayi varuvaanirikkunnavanumaaya kartthaave! Ninte thirunaamatthe sthothram chey/u200bvaanaayi bandhanatthilninnu enne mochippikkaname.
Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Nyangallude sharaname! Ennekkum ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.
( anantaram kaumaa, vishvaasa pramaanam, marichavarkku vendiyulllla kukkiliyon enniva)

items.content: Nyangallude kartthaavum nithya daivavume! Ninakku sthuthi, ninakku sthuthi, ninakku sthuthi. Kartthaave! Ninte krpayaalum mahaakarunayaalum nyangallude praarththhana kellkkaname. Nyangallude shushrooshakalle amgeekarikkaname. Nyangallude sahaayatthinu vannu nyangallude marichavarkku paapaparihaaram nalkaname. Sathyavishvaasatthode ninnilulllla sharanatthil nidrapraapichirikkunna ee daasanu paapaparihaaram nalkukayum cheyyaname.

Inne divasam sathyavishvaasatthodum daivikamaaya yogyathayodumkoodi kristhyaanikkuchithamaaya nilayil nidrapraapichirikkunna ee mishihaayude bhrthyane Daivam thante nirmmalamaaya thrkkaikallil amgeekarikkuvaan vendi namukkellaavarkkumkoodi avidutthe karunayodu praarththhikkaam. Kartthaavu santoshapoornnamaaya unnathasthhaanam ivanu nalkatte. Svargaraajyatthile manavarayum thottavum meshayum kartthaavu ivanu nalkumaaraakatte. Kannukallaal kaanappedukayo chevikallaal kellkkappedukayo cheythittillaatthathum Daivam thanne snehikkunnavarkkaayi orukkiyirikkunnathumaaya vaagdaanam kartthaavu ivanil nivartthiyaakkatte. Kartthaavu ivante paapangall pariharikkukayum thettukall kshamikkukayum cheyyatte. Kleshapoornnamaaya ihalokatthil vachu ivan cheythu poyittulllla paapangallum thettukallum Daivam maayichu kallayukayum thante mahaakarunayaal avaye orkkaathirikkukayum cheyyatte. Neethimaanmaaril karunacheyyunnathaaya samayatthu ivanilum karuna cheyyumaaraakatte. Krpaaluvaaya thanne kopippicha dushdanmaarodu Daivam prathikaaram cheyyunna samayatthu - karuna aavashyamaayivarunna aa divasatthil Daivam ivanil karuna cheyyatte. Daivam thante vishuddhanmaarudeyum theranyedukkappedu nnavarudeyum koottatthil ivane aanandippikkatte. Aa daridranaaya laasarinodukoode ivaneyum Daivam aanandippikkatte. Kaarunyamaakunna nalla ennakondu thangallude deepeshdikall kettupokaathe sookshicha buddhimathikallaaya aa anchu kanyakamaarodoppam Daivam ivaneyum aanandippikkumaaraakatte. Thangallude adukkal ninnulllla ivante verpaadil vilapichum duഃkhichum ivide avasheshichirikkunnavare mashihaa thampuraan karunayode aashvasippichu dhairyappedutthatte. Kartthaavu avarude mukhatthuninnu kannuneerum hrdayatthilninnu neerunna vedanayum neekkikkallanyu avaril sathyamudra pathikkumaaraakatte. Laasarinte sahodarikalle thangallude sahodarante uyirppumoolam santoshippichavanaaya Daivam ivante verpaadil duഃkhichirikkunna ellaavareyum aashvasippichu santoshippikkatte.

Vathsalasahodarangalle! Parasparam aashvasippikkuvin anyonyam dhairyappedutthuvin marichavarude samskaaratthil neetheekaranam praapikkuvin. Mrthanil ninnu karuna pinvalikkaruth. Virunnubhavanatthil pokunnathinekkaall utthamam vilaapabhavanatthil pokunnathaan, ennulllla kalpanayanusarichu vishuddha sabhayude prajakall enna nilayil ippoll ningall vannu aa daivikamaaya thiruvezhutthu nirvahichirikkunnu. Daivam ningallude sahaayatthinu vannu ningallkku samaadhaanavum shaantiyum nalkatte. Kartthaavu thante mahaakarunayaal ningallude kadangall pariharikkukayum thettukall kshamikkukayum cheyyatte. Utthamahrdayatthodum vedippodum vishuddhiyodum koodi ningall villikkunna ethu samayatthum kartthaavaaya yeshumashihaa ningallkkuttharamarullum. Aishvaryapoornnamaaya thante shreebhandaaratthilninnu kartthaavu ningallude yaachanakallkku marupadi ayachutharikayum cheyyum. “ente pithaavinaal anugrahikkappettavare! Lokaarambhatthinu mumpu thanne ningallkkaayi oru kkappettirikkunna svargaraajyam vannu anubhavichukolllluvin” ennarullicheyyunna santoshapradamaaya shabdam kellkkuvaan Daivam ningallkku samgathiyaakkatte. Ningalludeyum ningallude paretharudeyum thante sharanatthil nidra praapichirikkunna ee mashihaayude daasanteyum paapangall kartthaavu pariharikkatte. Kartthaavu ivane thante valatthubhaagatthu villichu niru tthumaaraakatte. Aadyamanushyan paapam cheyyunnathinumumpu avante koodaaram kartthaavu sthhaapicha athe sthhaanatthu thanne ivante vaasavum aanandavum aayittheerumaaraakatte. Daivamaathaavaaya mariyaaminteyum sakala parishuddha nmaarudeyum praarththhanayaal svargeeyasabhayilum ee bhaumikasabhayilum ivayellaam saadhikkumaaraakaname ennu nyangall praarththhikkukayum cheyyunnu.

Daivam thante sharanatthinmel nidrapraapichirikkunna thante daasanum aaraadhakanumaaya ivane krpayode aashvasippikkumaaraakatte. Nammude ee koottatthinmel daivatthinte karuna ennenneykkum randu lokangallilum undaayirikkukayum cheyyumaaraakatte.
Aammeen.

content: Shavasamskkaara shushrooshakramam 2000 em. O. Si. Pablikkeshan‍su
